title: Incorrect "Build" popup action enablement
description: The "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled, even if the user selects "Perform build automatically on resource modification" in the Preferences -> Workbench. This behavior is incorrect.
OB: The "Build" action in the Java perspective's context-sensitive popup menu is always enabled, irrespective of the user's preference to perform automatic builds on resource modification.
EB: The "Build" action should respect the user's preference to perform automatic builds on resource modification. If the user selects "Perform build automatically", the "Build" option should be disabled in the context-sensitive popup menu.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the Java perspective. 
2. Go to Preferences -> Workbench. 
3. Select "Perform build automatically on resource modification". 
4. Right-click on any resource in the Java perspective. 
5. Observe that the "Build" option is still enabled in the context-sensitive popup menu, despite the preference being selected.
